artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Tsutaya Kichizō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Left panel of triptych: P.75.51.200 (R), P.75.51.199 (C), P.75.51.198 (L). This triptych represents the scene of "dohyō-iri" ceremony, this wrestler apperars to be "tachi-mochi", the sword holder, one of the two attendants of a "yokozuna" wrestler.
title: Wrestler Takaneyama Masaemon from Higo Province
